exceptions.tactic: intros g f b a H1 H2 H3 H4.
intros g' f b a H1 H2 H3 H4.
intros g' f' b a H1 H2 H3 H4.
intros g' f' b' a H1 H2 H3 H4.
intros g' f' b' a' H1 H2 H3 H4.

exceptions.exn: In environment f, g : R -> R a, b : R H : a < b H0 : forall x : R, a <= x <= b -> continuous g x H1 : forall x : R, a <= x <= b -> continuous f x H2 : forall x : R, a < x < b -> f x < g x Unable to unify "RInt ?M2365 ?M2367 ?M2368 < RInt ?M2366 ?M2367 ?M2368 \\/ RInt ?M2365 ?M2367 ?M2368 = RInt ?M2366 ?M2367 ?M2368" with "RInt f a b < RInt g a b".

In environment H3 : forall (f g : R -> R) (a b : R), a <= b -> ex_RInt f a b -> ex_RInt g a b -> (forall x : R, a < x < b -> f x <= g x) -> RInt f a b <= RInt g a b f, g : R -> R a, b : R H : a < b H2 : forall x : R, a < x -> x < b -> f x < g x H1 : forall x : R, a <= x -> x <= b -> continuous f x H0 : forall x : R, a <= x -> x <= b -> continuous g x Unable to unify "RInt ?M2711 ?M2713 ?M2714 < RInt ?M2712 ?M2713 ?M2714 \\/ RInt ?M2711 ?M2713 ?M2714 = RInt ?M2712 ?M2713 ?M2714" with "RInt f a b < RInt g a b".

In environment H4 : forall (f g : R -> R) (a b : R), a <= b -> ex_RInt f a b -> ex_RInt g a b -> (forall x : R, a < x < b -> f x <= g x) -> RInt f a b <= RInt g a b f, g : R -> R a, b : R H : a < b H2 : forall x : R, a < x -> x < b -> f x < g x H1 : forall x : R, a <= x -> x <= b -> continuous f x H0 : forall x : R, a <= x -> x <= b -> continuous g x Unable to unify "RInt ?M3031 ?M3033 ?M3034 < RInt ?M3032 ?M3033 ?M3034 \\/ RInt ?M3031 ?M3033 ?M3034 = RInt ?M3032 ?M3033 ?M3034" with "RInt f a b < RInt g a b".

original: intros g f b a H1 H2 H3 H4. apply RInt_le; auto. intros x Hx. apply H3; lra. intros x Hx. apply H4; lra.
